title: macOS Keychain Issues
description: Fix constant password prompts and Keychain login errors on macOS.

steps.title: Repair Keychain
steps.instruction: Open 'Keychain Access' app → Click 'Keychain Access' in menu bar → 'Settings' (or Preferences) → 'Reset Default Keychains'. This creates a fresh start.

steps.title: Lock/Unlock Keychain
steps.instruction: Right-click the 'login' keychain in the sidebar → 'Lock Keychain login' → then 'Unlock Keychain login'. This refreshes the session.

steps.title: Delete Corrupted Items
steps.instruction: Search for specific app names in Keychain Access and delete entries that are causing repeated prompts. Re-login to the app to recreate them.

steps.title: Sync with Login Password
steps.instruction: Keychain Access → Edit → 'Change Password for Keychain login'. Ensure it matches your macOS login password to prevent prompts.

steps.title: Clear Local Items Cache
steps.instruction: In Finder, Go → Go to Folder → '~/Library/Keychains'. Delete the folder with the long random string ID and restart immediately.
